text: Lucina Juliana von der Heyde (born 24 January 1997) is an Argentine field hockey player and who plays as midfielder for German club Mannheimer HC. She was part of the Argentine team at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro. At the 2018 Hockey Stars Awards, she was named the FIH Rising Star of the Year. In 2019 she took a break from the national team. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic field hockey players of Argentina Category:Argentine female field hockey players Category:Field hockey players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Argentine people of German descent Category:Las Leonas players Category:People from Posadas, Misiones Category:Female field hockey midfielders Category:Mannheimer HC players Category:Feldhockey Bundesliga (Women's field hockey) players
title: Lucina von der Heyde
